Pass4NT1Pass5♥2
Pass5NT3Pass6♥4
Pass7♦AP
1. Blackwood 0314, for ♦
2. A=2/5 or 5/5, Q(D)=0
3. King ask by 5NT
4. K=2

1. Inviting Jump Shifts
